member.name: T:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar
member.summary: Represents an Ethiopian calendar and provides methods to convert and manipulate dates in Ethiopian and Gregorian calendars.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.#ctor(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified date in the Gregorian calendar.
member.param: The date in the Gregorian calendar.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.Date(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts the Gregorian date to the Ethiopian date.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The Ethiopian date in the format "yyyy-MM-dd".

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.Year(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the year of the Ethiopian date.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The year of the Ethiopian date.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.Month(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the month of the Ethiopian date.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The month of the Ethiopian date.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.Quarter(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the quarter of the Ethiopian date.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The quarter of the Ethiopian date.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.QuarterName(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the name of the quarter in the specified culture's language.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the name.
member.returns: The name of the quarter in the specified culture's language.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.MonthName(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the name of the month in the specified culture's language.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the name.
member.returns: The name of the month in the specified culture's language.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.Day(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the day of the Ethiopian date.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The day of the Ethiopian date.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.Week(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the week of the Ethiopian date.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The week of the Ethiopian date.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.DayOfYear(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the day of the year in the Ethiopian calendar.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The day of the year in the Ethiopian calendar.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.WeekDay(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the name of the weekday in the specified culture's language.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the name.
member.returns: The name of the weekday in the specified culture's language.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.FiscalYear(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the fiscal year in the Ethiopian calendar.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The fiscal year in the Ethiopian calendar.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.FiscalMonth(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the fiscal month in the Ethiopian calendar.
member.param: The culture info for formatting the date.
member.returns: The fiscal month in the Ethiopian calendar.

member.name: M:EthiopianCalendarConverter.EthiopianCalendar.IsLeapYear(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Checks if the specified year is a leap year in the Ethiopian calendar.
member.param: The culture info to use for leap year calculation.
member.returns: True if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, false.
